name: National Cheng Kung University
description: National Cheng Kung University (NCKU), located in Tainan City, Taiwan and founded in 1931, is a leading comprehensive university with more than 60 departments in 9 colleges. Our educational goal is to lend the students the essentials of humanities, global vision, and independent thinking. Our research objective is to pursue innovation, to foster logical thinking, and to discover the unknown. The University is committed to enhancing its reputation through abundant resources, strong alumni support, and cooperative ventures with the Tainan Science-based Industrial Park. We have been selected the Prominent Research University in Taiwan, and we are ready to meet the challenges of the 21st century.
